data.title: Simpsons Siblings
data.meta_description: A Simpsons Podcast hosted by lifelong fans Shaun and Sari! We are a brother and sister team excited to over-analyze everything about our favorite show.
data.text:
The lies. Stop. Now! It's time to discuss 34x03 "Lisa the Boy Scout", an episode filled with clips never intended to be seen by the public. Take a break from your undercover job at the elementary school and join in the conspiracy!

Support us on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/simpsonssibs/

Follow us on Twitter: @SimpsonsSibs

Music provided by NCS: https://ncs.io/adventure

Get one f...

It's a podcast... and what a podcast! Get your head out of the Shine-O-Ball-O, it's time for S06E13 "And Maggie Makes Three"! Join us as we follow Homer's journey from burning bridges, to pin monkey, and finally to that now famous plague... I mean plaque.

See our YouTube short with fun facts about this Simpsons episode!

Support us on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/simpsonssibs/

...

We're powering through with Part 2 of The Simpsons Movie, because we can't pause recording for every sop or yeld sign. Grab a mug of that famous Flanders hot cocoa and join us as we wrap up this project!

Support us on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/simpsonssibs/

Follow us on Twitter and YouTube

Music provided by NCS: https://ncs.io/adventure

Re:anime internet radio station (run by Shau...

We put a lot of thought into which episode to review next, then we remembered the words of the great Russ Cargill:

"Anyone can pick something when they know what it is; It takes real leadership to pick something you're clueless about."

With that spirit in mind The Simpsons Siblings proudly presents part one of our review of The Simpsons Movie!

Support us on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/...

Need some excitement around here? No need to call a fire drill - instead join us as we discuss S08E12 "Mountain of Madness"! This teambuilding exercise is sure to bring lots of laughs, and plenty of moderately-priced champagne!

See our YouTube short with fun facts about this Simpsons episode!

Support us on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/simpsonssibs/

Follow us on Twitter: @SimpsonsSibs

Join us in the Attila the Fun of S11E09 "Grift of the Magi"! It's Christmastime in Springfield, and the new owners of Springfield Elementary have a sneaky idea on how to come up with the perfect toy. Grab your Funzo European Voltage Converter and give it a listen! (Why not bring three?)

See our YouTube short with fun facts about this Simpsons episode!

Support us on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/si...

Ready for an episode that tastes terrible, but is smooth and mild? Join us as we cover S11E05 "E-I-E-I-(Annoyed Grunt)". It's Simpsons on the farm with a nicotine twist. Don't like it? Then I challenge you to a duel!

See our YouTube short with fun facts about this Simpsons episode!

Support us on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/simpsonssibs/

Follow us on Twitter: @SimpsonsSibs

...

Listen up old school, because it's time for S12E14 "New Kids on the Blecch"! Get N*Sync with our discussion and join the Party Posse on their world tour! YVAN EHT NIOJ!

See our YouTube short with fun facts about this Simpsons episode!

Support us on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/simpsonssibs/

Follow us on Twitter: @SimpsonsSibs

Music provided by NCS: https://ncs.io/adventure

<...

You don't have to sell your soul for another Halloween Simpsons podcast because we're covering S5E05 "Treehouse of Horror IV"! So whether you're driving your Gremlin or you're relaxing in your vacation home in Pennsylvania, take a listen and enjoy this classic episode with us!

See our YouTube short with fun facts about this Simpsons episode!

Support us on Patreon: http://www.patreon.c...

You won't have to visit a Halloween pop-up store for the scary fun of The Simpsons S27E04 "Halloween of Horror"! In our season premiere we take a tour through Krusty's Halloween Horror Nights and examine this canon Halloween spook-tacular! Grab your Tailee, head over to Everscream Terrors, and have a fun Grown-up Halloween with us!

Support us on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/simpsonssibs/

Fol...

Have some summer fun at the Casa de Flandereses while we swim into The Simpsons S07E25 "Summer of 4 Ft. 2." for our late summer break episode. This is a fan favorite and one that we love ourselves, just watch out and don't get the dud!

See our YouTube short with fun facts about this Simpsons episode!

Follow us on Twitter: @SimpsonsSibs

Music provided by NCS: https://ncs.io/adventure

Grab a chocolate chip cheesecake and a bottle of tequila as we discuss The Simpsons S03E15 "Homer Alone"! Join Marge as she takes a well-needed vacation, while Homer and the kids embark on their own set of misadventures. And remember: you can't spell "Relaxo" without "relax"!

Follow us on Twitter: @SimpsonsSibs

Music provided by NCS: https://ncs.io/adventure

Get one fre...

Having dinner with friends? Dinner alone? Watching TV alone? Come with us while we wrap up our two-parter of The Simpsons S07E01 "Who Shot Mr. Burns?" with our special guest stars Alísa and Moth. We wallow in the crapulence of reliving this classic episode through fresh eyes.

Follow us on Twitter: @SimpsonsSibs

Music provided by NCS: https://ncs.io/adventure

Get one free month on the Barkbox Sup...

We talk with our two friends Alísa and Moth, the only two people left in the world who don't know the mystery of The Simpsons S06E25 "Who Shot Mr. Burns?" Join us while we look at this episode through a fresh set of chocolate microscopes and work to solve this mystery. I mean, it's our job, right?

CORRECTION: We say at the end that "Who Shot Mr Burns Part Two is episode S06E26 when it's really...

Join us for a special episode of The Futurama Fam where we talk about Futurama S06E07 "The Late Philip J. Fry." If time is a loop would the next version of our universe be the same? Would there be any slight differences? Hop in the One-Way Time Machine with us and find out!

Follow us on Twitter: @SimpsonsSibs

Music provided by NCS: https://ncs.io/adventure

Get one free month on the Barkbox Super...

Grab a bowl of fruit gelatin for the shocking episode of The Simpsons, S01E04 "There's No Disgrace Like Home." You'll love this episode or double your money back! (Not a guarantee)

Follow us on Twitter: @SimpsonsSibs

Music provided by NCS: https://ncs.io/adventure

Get one free month on the Barkbox SuperChewer subscription service for dogs: http://www.superchewer.com/simpsons/

Support th...

We just had to choo-choo-choose this as our Valentine's Day episode! The Simpsons S04E15 "I Love Lisa" is the perfect gift to give instead of chocolate, because nothing gets chocolate out.

Follow us on Twitter: @SimpsonsSibs

Music provided by NCS: https://ncs.io/adventure

Get one free month on the Barkbox SuperChewer subscription service for dogs: http://www.superchewer.com/simpsons/

Support...

We cross the line into Shelbyville to talk about The Simpsons S06E24 "Lemon of Troy." As Simpsons fans this iconic and radical episode is definitely a part of us all. A part of us all. A part of us all!

Follow us on Twitter: @SimpsonsSibs

Music provided by NCS: https://ncs.io/adventure

Get one free month on the Barkbox SuperChewer subscription service for dogs: http://www.superchewer.com/simpson...

Check out our latest character study of our favorite hippie fugitive, Mona Simpson. She may not be in many episodes, but her impact on Homer and the future of germ warfare is felt throughout the series.

Follow us on Twitter: @SimpsonsSibs

Music provided by NCS: https://ncs.io/adventure
